oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of decalin synthons of bioactive terpenoids: Lewis acid catalyzed Diels-Alder reactions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAYELVAGANAN, T
HADIMANI, SB
BHAT, SV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: convenient synthesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Diels-Alder reaction of 1,3,3-trimethyl-2-vinylcyclohexene I with conjugated ketones 2 - 7 in the presence of Lewis acid leads to regio- and stereo-selective formation of bicyclic adducts 8 - 13 versatile intermediates to labdanes, abietane and spongian diterpenoids. (CC) 1997, .
